function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of SARS-CoV-2 across countries through air travel","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-country transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Air travel screening and contact tracing technology","People":"Travelers, airline staff, and residents of destination countries","Owner":"Government health agencies and international organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in the transmission potential of SARS-CoV-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","Impact":"Variation in transmission rates within the country","Mitigation":"Improvement of urban sanitation and public transportation measures","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure and public transportation monitoring systems","People":"Urban residents and commuters","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries' commitment to population health","Impact":"Variation in healthcare capacity and resources","Mitigation":"Increase in healthcare funding and resource allocation","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems and telemedicine","People":"Healthcare workers and patients","Owner":"Government health departments and healthcare institutions"}]}
